name: AutoPlanner (w/ Notion AI)
description: Hi there! This system is designed to make your life easier by creating daily schedules that fit your needs and preferences. A prewritten Notion AI script uses information about your tasks, the time you want to allocate to each task, events, and routines to generate a customized schedule that works for you. This not only simplifies your daily planning but also adds a bit of spontaneity to your life. Plus...Notion AI can even generate a daily recap of what you worked on, what happened, and your wr
features: Notion AI can even generate a daily recap of what you worked on, what happened, and your written reflection.; The system is implemented using theconfigured content design pattern, so it is simple, intuitive, and maintainable.; The template also comes with a "System Card" that explains what the databases and views are for, as well as an instructions manual to help you set up and use the system.
